name: Parse Production Telemetry
description: Parse production logs and extract telemetry events for analysis

movements.name: Parse Telemetry
movements.description: Extract telemetry data from production logs

beats.title: Parse Requested
acceptanceCriteria: Handler executes successfully and completes
Output is valid and conforms to schema
Event is published to event stream
Telemetry is recorded for monitoring
No errors or warnings are logged
beats.userStory: As a system user, I want the parseTelemetryRequested operation to execute reliably so that system functions operate as expected.

movements.userStory: As a user, I want Parse Telemetry so that the system operates correctly.
